name: Chandradeep Kanumalla
profileSummary: 6+ years of experience in responsive front-end development using ReactJS, Angular, TypeScript, and JavaScript. Skilled in performance optimization, integration with backend APIs, and unit testing using Jest. Passionate about UI/UX, scalable design, and cinematic storytelling.

projects.description: Developing RTT (Real Time Tool) for 5G services.
Onboarding and investment portal with KYC validation.
Multi-brand e-commerce site migration from Angular to React.
Event management app including exhibitor and meeting management.
Smart ERP with inventory, service, SLA, logistics, and procurement modules.
B2B tourism booking platform for hotel and travel packages.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

experience.title: Real Time Tool
experience.description: Application is used to build an RTT (Real Time Tool), which facilitates the development of new applications for 5G services provided across various locations in USA.
keyLearnings: Developed practical expertise in Material UI, using its components and styling system to create a polished, responsive UI.

experience.title: Consumer Platform
experience.description: A comprehensive platform for customer onboarding and investment management, including KYC verification and trade management for alternate investments.
keyLearnings: Gained practical experience with micro frontends, implementing Module Federation to enable dynamic loading of independent modules, improving scalability.
Developed and maintained comprehensive test cases using Jest and React Testing Library, ensuring application reliability and high code coverage.

experience.title: Titan E-Commerce
experience.description: Multi-brand e-commerce website offering a wide range of products from Titan’s various brands like Tanishq, Zoya, and Fastrack.
keyLearnings: Participated in migrating the project from Angular to React, enhancing skills in project transitions and component-based architecture.
Learned and implemented Redux for state management, improving scalability and maintainability.
Integrated Google Sign-In for improved user authentication and experience.

experience.title: Bravura Event Management
experience.description: A web application for managing events from end-to-end, including meetings, exhibitor management, and customer events.
keyLearnings: Gained experience in image mapping for polygonal shapes and implementing dynamic calculations based on window resizing.
Explored Node.js and MongoDB, enhancing back-end skills alongside SQL Server experience.

experience.title: B2B Tourism Booking
experience.description: A web application for tourism booking management, enabling efficient booking processes for travel agents, including hotels, sightseeing, and transfers.
keyLearnings: Developed a deep understanding of creating user-friendly interfaces.
Successfully integrated payment gateways for seamless transactions.
Gained experience with UI libraries like Bootstrap to enhance design consistency and responsiveness.

experience.title: Smart ERP
experience.description: A collaborative ERP platform focused on workflow automation, including AMC service planning, tracking engineers, stock management, and logistics.
keyLearnings: Developed this project from scratch, gaining first experience with Angular.
Implemented lazy loading for routes and images, reducing loading speed from 6s to 3s.
Strengthened client communication skills by visiting client site and gathering direct feedback.

roles.text: Developed responsive and interactive user interfaces using React and Angular, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate design mockups into functional code, improving user experience.
Integrated front-end interfaces with back-end APIs, ensuring smooth communication and functionality.
Built reusable components and implemented modern design patterns to streamline development and maintain consistency.
Optimized the performance of web applications for faster load times and better responsiveness.
Worked with version control tools like Git, managing deployments on platforms like Azure and AWS.
Ensured code quality and stability through unit testing, writing test cases, and resolving production issues efficiently.
Engaged in Agile/Scrum processes, collaborating within cross-functional teams to meet project goals and deadlines.
